title: Minsoo Kang, trans. “The Story of Hong Gildong” (Penguin Classics, 2016)
description:
Minsoo Kang‘s new translation of The Story of Hong Gildong (Penguin Classics, 2016) is a wonderful rendering of a text that is arguably the “single most important work of classicâ€¦prose fiction of Korea.” Though Hong Gildong is a popular figure in modern Korean culture – a kind of Robin Hood...
